lib.rs
Base Mint
use anchor_lang::prelude::*;
 
declare_id!("Wizard22...");
 
#[program]
pub mod token_wizard {
    use super::*;
 
    pub fn initialize_mint(
        ctx: Context<InitializeMint>,
        name: String,
        symbol: String,
        decimals: u8,
    ) -> Result<()> {
        msg!("Creating token: {}", name);
        Ok(())
    }
}
